data: David  Huse David  Huse Professor of Physics 609-258-4407 huse@Princeton.EDU 329 Jadwin Hall Statistical physics, phase transitions, quantum many-body physics of ultracold atoms, many-body localization, magnetic ordering in materials and in spin models, superconductivity, out of equilibrium quantum dynamics. Selected Publications http://arxiv.org/find/cond-mat/1/au:+Huse_D/0/1/0/all/0/1 Lecture videos 2014-10-02 Princeton University, Department of Physics. Video stream Quantum thermalization, many-body Anderson localization, and the entanglement frontier
